title: UPDATE FAILED CHECK LOGS FOR MORE INFORMATION
body: hello i got an issue trying to install the new beta cleint pops out a messag ''update failed , unspecified error occured check logs for more information

replies.body: Or you can opt out of the beta client as per Derinx's comment on this thread http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/AAhWfJY1-how-to-cancel-my-client-update?sort_type=best

Sounds like this is happening after 32% during patching. If so, this is likely caused by an unstable connection to the patching servers and is probably the result of conflicting network settings. Check out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of steps that will have a good chance at resolving this issue.

Let me know the results of those steps.
